[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [MapViewImageCache](./harp-mapview.mapviewimagecache.md)

## MapViewImageCache class

Cache images wrapped into \[\[ImageItem\]\]s for a \[\[MapView\]\]. An image may have multiple names in a theme, the `MapViewImageCache` will take care of that. Registering multiple images with the same name is invalid.

The `MapViewImageCache` uses a global \[\[ImageCache\]\] to actually store (and generate) the image data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class MapViewImageCache 
```

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [mapView](./harp-mapview.mapviewimagecache.mapview.md) |  | [MapView](./harp-mapview.mapview.md) |  |
|  [numberOfNames](./harp-mapview.mapviewimagecache.numberofnames.md) |  | number | Returns number of image names stored in the cache. |
|  [numberOfUrls](./harp-mapview.mapviewimagecache.numberofurls.md) |  | number | Returns number of image URLs in the cache. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addImage(name, url, startLoading)](./harp-mapview.mapviewimagecache.addimage.md) |  | Add an image and optionally start loading it. Once done, the \[\[ImageData\]\] or \[\[ImageBitmap\]\] will be stored in the \[\[ImageItem\]\]. |
|  [clear()](./harp-mapview.mapviewimagecache.clear.md) |  | Remove all \[\[ImageItem\]\]s from the cache. Also removes all \[\[ImageItem\]\]s that belong to this \[\[MapView\]\] from the global \[\[ImageCache\]\]. |
|  [findImageByName(name)](./harp-mapview.mapviewimagecache.findimagebyname.md) |  | Find \[\[ImageItem\]\] by its name. |
|  [findImageByUrl(url)](./harp-mapview.mapviewimagecache.findimagebyurl.md) |  | Find \[\[ImageItem\]\] by URL. |
|  [findNames(url)](./harp-mapview.mapviewimagecache.findnames.md) |  | Return the names under which an image with the given URL is saved. |
|  [hasName(name)](./harp-mapview.mapviewimagecache.hasname.md) |  | Return <code>true</code> if an image with the given name is known. |
|  [hasUrl(url)](./harp-mapview.mapviewimagecache.hasurl.md) |  | Return <code>true</code> if an image with the given URL is known. |
|  [loadImage(imageItem)](./harp-mapview.mapviewimagecache.loadimage.md) |  | Load an \[\[ImageItem\]\]. Returns a promise or a loaded \[\[ImageItem\]\]. |
|  [registerImage(name, url, image)](./harp-mapview.mapviewimagecache.registerimage.md) |  | Register an existing image by name. |
